flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: This project uses a hacked wiimote, a hacked xbox360 controller, 2 netduino microcontrollers and 2 xbee radios to allow for headtracking control in FPS games.
guide.title: IR Cam Headtracking using wiimote and xbox360 (netduino)
